abstract: Pentagon officials announce that Rear Adm John F Kirby, the public face of the American military in his role as Pentagon press secretary, is stepping down; surprise move follows statement from incoming Sec of Defense Ashton Carter that he wants civilian in role.
lead_paragraph: Rear Admiral John F. Kirby is the first casualty of a new defense secretary who has expressed reservations about having a uniformed officer serve as the Defense Department’s press secretary.

headline.main: John Kirby, Pentagon Spokesman, Will Be Replaced With a Civilian
